description: This file defines a custom React hook named useSwipe that detects swipe gestures on a referenced DOM element. It manages touch event listeners and determines swipe directions based on touch movement, calling a callback with the detected direction.

methods.name: useSwipe({ onSwipe, threshold = 20 } = {})
methods.description: Custom React hook that detects swipe gestures on an element, providing a ref for attaching to the element and invoking a callback on swipe detection.
